attributes.action: Vista has been openly sold by Microsoft knowing that it doesn't work properly
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Microsoft has knowingly sold Vista globally when it was full of bugs. They are in breach of the UK's consumer laws regarding goods fit for purpose. As such they should be prosecuted immediately, and banned from selling any further copies of Vista in England until all the bugs have been taken out and it's fit for purpose. Any extra expenses incurred by people caused by Vista should be charged to Microsoft.

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
